title: Admissions & Aid - Institute of Pharmacy
content:
Title: Admissions & Aid - Institute of Pharmacy

Bachelor of Pharmacy is a four-year programme designed to enhance skills, knowledge, communication, patient care, healthcare system organisations, development of professional identity, critical thinking, and lifelong learning.
Master of Pharmacy (MPharm) is a two year (Four Semesters) postgraduate programme approved by Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) for following specialisations.
The University has Postdoctoral Fellowship Programme with an aim to identify active researchers and to provide them a platform to carry out research in frontier areas.
Institute of pharmacy has been trying its best to give the best possible knowledge to all students. the faculty is very helpful, resourceful as well as encouraging. the institute caters to all...
Priyanshi Desai (17BPH069) has received fully funded Research Fellowship to pursue Masters in Pharmacology (Neuroscience and Cancer Therapeutics) at College of Medicine ...
